A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has (as of right now) a 56% audience approval. Attack of the Clones has a 57%. Let that sink in. That's all you need to know. This movie is garbage. I walked out feeling like my questions weren't answered. Snoke? Naahh he doesn't matter just kill him. Rey's parents? Nope just drunks who sold her for drinking money. What's Luke been doing this whole time on Ahch-To? Nothing super powerful or amazing at all. Just waiting to die. Oh and Leia is suddenly Superman. That one scene ruined this movie.
